createidlx.gui.display_link.placeholders:
Use '$' or '{}' placeholders to insert the data
once or multiple times anywhere inside the string;

for displaying the above characters literally, use
backslash escaping: '\$' and '\{}' respectively.

In case of no unescaped placeholders present,
default concatenation method will be used instead.
Placeholders are disabled by the server config.

'Progress Bar' display format support
is %s by the server config.
